Asentel-ik·im yettmuddu-d %s i temnaḍin yemgaraden n "yiḥder" i kečč·kemm i tmerna d uẓrag n ugbur. Ɛreḍ ad ternuḍ afeggag n unadi, tignatin tinmettiyin, neɣ anawen-nniḍen n yiḥedran syen wali amek ara d-banen deg usmel-ik·im.
Display block breadcrumbs deactivated: Askan n breadcrumbs n yiḥder yensa
Display block breadcrumbs activated: Askan n breadcrumbs n yiḥder yermed
Your theme does not contain any Widget A: Asentel-ik·im ulac akk deg-s timnaḍin n uwiǧit.
Blocks in this Widget Area will not be d: Iḥedran deg temnaḍt n yiwiǧit ur d-yettwaskanen ara deg usmel-ik·im.
Widget Areas are global parts in your si: Timnaḍin n yiwiǧiten d iḥricen imatuyen deg tneɣruft n usmel-ik·im i izemren ad qeblent iḥedran. Ttemgaradent almend n usentel, maca nettaf-iten s tuget deg yimukan am ufeggag adisen neɣ deg uḍar n usebter.
Could not save the following widgets: %s: Ur yezmir ara ad isekles awiǧit-a: %s.
Want to stick with the old widgets?: Tebɣiḍ ad teǧǧeḍ agrudem aqbur n usefrek n yiwiǧiten?
You can now add any block to your site\u: Tzemreḍ tura ad ternuḍ iḥder tebɣiḍ ɣer temnaḍin n uwiǧit n usmel-ik·im. Ur ttagad, meṛṛa iwiǧiten-ik·im i tesmenyafayeḍ ad qqimen teddun akken iwata.
Contain text cursor inside block deactiv: Asensi n teḥnaccaḍt n uḍris yellan deg yiḥeder.
Contain text cursor inside block activat: Armad n teḥnaccaḍt n uḍris yellan deg yiḥder
Shows block breadcrumbs at the bottom of: Sken breadcrumbs n yiḥder ddaw n umaẓrag.
Ad yerr amaẓrag am usentel-inek m.
Aids screen readers by stopping text car: Ad iɛiwen imeɣriyen n ugdil s useḥbes n teḥnaccaḍt n uḍris akken ur tetteffeɣ ara seg yiḥder.
Contain text cursor inside block: Yegber taḥnacaḍt n uḍris deg yiḥder urmid
New to the block editor? Want to learn m: Amaynut deg umaẓrag n yiḥder? Tebɣiḍ ad teẓreḍ ugar ɣef useqdec-ines?
Learn how to use the block editor: Issin amek ara tesqedceḍ amaẓrag n yiḥder
All of the blocks available to you live: Akk iḥedran llan i kečč·kemm deg temkarḍit n yiḥderen. Ad t-tafeḍ di yal adeg ara twaliḍ tignit <InserterIconImage />.
Each block comes with its own set of con: Yal iḥder yettas-d s yisenqaden-ines netta i ubeddel n kra am yini, tehri d ujerred. Wigi ad d-ttbanen, ad tteffren s wudem awurman mi ara d-tferneḍ iḥder.
Change the block type after adding a new: Beddel anaw n yiḥder ticki ara yettwarennu umagrad amaynut.
Navigate to the previous part of the edi: Inig ɣer uḥric uzwir n umaẓrag.
Inig ɣer weḥric uḍfir n umaẓrag.
Access all block and document tools in a: Addef ifecka n meṛra iḥedran akked isemliyen seg yiwen n umkan
You have unsaved changes. If you proceed: Tesɛiḍ ibeddilen ur neklis ara. Ma tekemmeleḍ ad ruḥen.
The editor has encountered an unexpected: Amaẓrag yemlal-d tuccḍa ur netturaǧu ara.
